data.name: Demolish & Build 3
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT GAME FROM OUR FRIENDS

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1120320/Builder_Simulator/


About the Game

TRY FREE DEMO!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2021130/Demolish__Build_3_Excavator_Playground/



Demolish & Build 3 is a first person simulation game in which the player becomes the owner of a demolition company. Your main tasks involve demolishing and building various structures and managing your company. To help you with those tasks you can use various tools and vehicles.

NEW PHYSICS

Demolish & Build 3 uses a brand new, realistic destruction model. Every fragment is physically simulated. Different parts of the structures interact with each which means that for example a few strategically placed explosives can collapse an entire building. Our destruction model provides a perfect balance between realism, performance and fun.

NEW COMPANY MANAGEMENT

You’ll start the game with a small plot of land and a simple shack. By the end you’ll build an empire with multiple vehicle parks and offices.

Company management will include features like:
  • hiring workers
  • buying tools and vehicles
  • buying land
  • building your own offices
  • managing finances
  • managing your workers

NEW VEHICLES

Throughout the game you can use a variety of vehicles, all with detailed models and sounds. Each vehicle can be driven from the cabin as well as from the outside. Some vehicles, like the excavator will also include several different attachments like shears or jackhammers to help you with your tasks.

data.short_description: In Demolish & Build 3 you play as the owner of a demolition company. Accept contracts and complete them yourself or delegate them to your workers. Use powerful equipment, from sledgehammers to giant cranes. Manage your company by hiring workers and buying new vehicles and properties.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
